title: SR and LR impacts of increased demand in perf comp

content.question: Assume that a firm that produces a good in a constant-cost perfectly competitive industry is in long-run equilibrium. If the demand for the good increases, the profit-maximizing output by the firm will change in which of the following ways in the short run and long run?

choices.label: Short Run Long Run Return to original level Return to original level
Short Run Long Run Increase Increase
Short Run Long Run Increase Return to original level
Short Run Long Run Decrease Decrease
Short Run Long Run Decrease Return to original level

content.answer: Short Run Long Run Increase Return to original level

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model
